3ff2edfc-eb20-47b9-8c0b-7fd2a387f7d9.test_scenario: Given node list and node list-all, when --top N is provided, then results return only top N most recently updated nodes
3ff2edfc-eb20-47b9-8c0b-7fd2a387f7d9.expected_result: Add --top option to list and list-all with recency sorting

e312415e-6576-4de2-9bd8-82614f0a232b.content: IN_PROGRESS: Add --top option to membank node list and list-all, sorted by most recent node update timestamp.

9e5b574f-ff0d-4259-9938-ba7f4775916f.content: DONE: Added --top option to membank node list and node list-all. Results are now sorted by most recent updated_at and limited to top N when provided. Added integration tests. 97 tests passing.

ef46391b-fc47-4532-8110-6b4186d96b57.content: membank node list/list-all now support --top with recency ordering. Skills commands remain stable. Full suite green at 97.

4bf16616-668c-4bd4-b183-1eed340bef31.test_scenario: Given story/feature/progress workflows, when updating progress, then status must be represented in the status field rather than prefixed in content text
4bf16616-668c-4bd4-b183-1eed340bef31.expected_result: Update AGENTS instructions to ban content prefixes like IN_PROGRESS:/DONE: and require node status updates

7095dba4-2c21-4635-9f4b-379eed0db826.content: Updated AGENTS instructions to require status tracking via status fields only, and removed DONE/IN_PROGRESS content-prefix examples.

7ff1613b-ce32-4527-b632-39b1674c2e1f.content: Agent instructions now explicitly forbid embedding status labels in node content. Status must be tracked via status fields and status commands.
